verbose_text: Releasing the constraints with DTT restored the wild-type (SecA Deltacys) behaviour : tight binding of SecYEG causing stimulation of the ATPase activity (XREF_FIG E- XREF_FIG G and Supplementary Table S1).
evidence: SecYEG causing stimulation of the ATPase activity ( XREF_FIG E- XREF_FIG G and Supplementary Table S1
